name: 蔡逸萍
objective: 本課程旨在訓練學生基礎中英口譯技能，強化學生口語表達及溝通能力，開拓知識領域以及培養學生的國際觀。由視譯、逐步短句，段落至長逐步口譯，循序漸進。從入門訣竅如讀稿技巧，筆記要領密集訓練及模擬演練。範圍涵蓋經貿，金融，時事，科技，產業等。
schedule:
WEEK	SESSION THEME
1	Introduction
2     	Interpretation as a Profession
3     	Public speaking/ Paraphrasing
4     	Paraphrasing/Sight translation (ST) I
5    	ST II 
6	ST III 
7	ST IV 
8   	ST V/memory exercises 
9    	Mid-term
10    	Memory retention and recall exercises I: Short consecutive interpreting (CI) on general topics  
11    	Memory retention and recall exercises II: Short CI on general topics 
12   	Note-taking for CI: Skills and strategies I 
13   	Note-taking for CI: Skills and strategies II 
14   	Note-taking for CI: Long CI on general topics I
15   	Note-taking for CI: Long CI on general topics II 
16   	Note-taking for CI: Long CI on general topics III*
17   	Wrap-up
18   	Final
	
	*More CI training shall continue in the spring term 2017
